title: Slick the Cat: The Adventures of a New York City Kitty
description: Librarian Note: Updated Edition of ASIN: B017HUUC08.THEY SAY YOU ALWAYS REMEMBER YOUR FIRST.The last thing that TJ was thinking about was adopting a cat. On the fast-track executive path at a New York public relations agency, she had no idea that a business trip to the West Coast, which included a visit to her sister’s home, would serve to introduce her to the wonders of a catTHE CAT THAT STOLE CHRISTMASThe one constancy in TJ’s life, Slick was there throughout her acclimation to New York, her marriage and to its eventual dissolution. Slick was a true adventurer whose antics included learning to walk on the wild side via a leash, scaling the mountains of Vermont (well sort of), killing Hamlet, being diagnosed with asthma, seeing a cat therapist, and quite literally stealing Christmas. But it was his unswerving loyalty, his enormous capacity for love, his hilarious sense of mischief and adventure that helped transform TJ’s life. He taught TJ that it was alright to let go, to reach for new adventures and to not allow things that you couldn’t control get the better of you.Today TJ shares her life with Jonny, the fourth cat to have owned her. Yet, years later it is Slick, her first, who had the strongest impact on her life. He was there during her transformative years, and he helped her to make it through them with a smile, a laugh and sometimes, a few tears.
author: T.J. Sacks
